>>===== MODE =====>>
citation
<<===== MODE =====<<


>>===== OPTIONS =====>>
{
  "require_explicit_legal_case_title_short": true
}
<<===== OPTIONS =====<<

>>===== ABBREVIATIONS =====>>
{
    "default": {
        "container-title": {
            "A.C.": "!jurisdiction>>>A.C.", 
            "E.W.C.A. Civ.": "!jurisdiction>>>E.W.C.A. Civ.", 
            "H&N": "!jurisdiction>>>H&N"
        }, 
        "institution-part": {
            "Court of Appeal": "C.A.", 
            "House of Lords": "H.L."
        }
    }
}
<<===== ABBREVIATIONS =====<<

>>===== RESULT =====>>
..[0] <i>Donoghue v Stevenson</i> [1932] AC 562 (HL) 563
..[1] ibid 566
..[2] DUMMY: <i>Bogus Book</i>
..[3] <i>Donoghue</i> (n 1) 563
..[4] ibid
..[5] <i>Callery v Gray</i> [2001] EWCA Civ 1117 [12]
..[6] ibid [15]
..[7] DUMMY: <i>Bogus Book</i> (n 3)
..[8] <i>Callery</i> (n 6) [16]
..[9] <i>Boulton v Jones</i> (1857) 2 H&#38;N 564
>>[10] <i>Stubbs v Sayer</i> (CA, 8 November 1990)
<<===== RESULT =====<<

<<===== CITATIONS =====<<




>>===== CSL =====>>
<style 
      xmlns="http://purl.org/net/xbiblio/csl"
      class="note"
      version="1.1mlz1"
      default-locale="en-GB">
  <info>
    <title>Test fixture</title>
    <id>http://citationstyles.org/tests/fixture</id>
    <link href="http://citationstyles.org/tests/fixture" rel="self"/>
    <link href="http://citationstyles.org/documentation/text" rel="documentation"/>
    <category citation-format="author-date"/>
    <updated>2014-04-30T13:19:38+00:00</updated>
    <rights license="http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/3.0/">This work is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 3.0 License</rights>
  </info>
  <locale>
    <terms>
      <term name="paragraph" form="static">[%s]</term>
    </terms>
  </locale>
  <macro name="juris-title">
    <text variable="title" font-style="italic" prefix="DUMMY: "/>
  </macro>
  <macro name="juris-title-short">
    <choose>
      <if variable="title-short">
        <text variable="title-short" font-style="italic" prefix="DUMMY: "/>
      </if>
      <else>
        <text variable="title" font-style="italic" prefix="DUMMY: "/>
      </else>
    </choose>
  </macro>
  <macro name="juris-main">
    <text value=""/>
  </macro>
  <macro name="juris-main-short">
    <text value=""/>
  </macro>
  <macro name="juris-tail">
    <text value=""/>
  </macro>
  <macro name="juris-tail-short">
    <text value=""/>
  </macro>
  <macro name="juris-locator">
    <text value=""/>
  </macro>
  <citation>
    <layout>
      <choose>
        <if position="first">
          <group delimiter=", ">
            <group delimiter=" ">
              <choose>
                <if type="book">
                  <text macro="juris-title" strip-periods="true"/>
                </if>
                <else>
                  <text macro="juris-title" strip-periods="true" font-style="italic"/>
                </else>
              </choose>
              <text macro="juris-main" strip-periods="true"/>
              <text macro="juris-locator"/>
            </group>
          </group>
        </if>
        <else-if position="ibid-with-locator">
          <group delimiter=" ">
            <text term="ibid" text-case="lowercase" strip-periods="true"/>
            <text macro="juris-locator"/>
          </group>
        </else-if>
        <else-if position="ibid">
          <text term="ibid" text-case="lowercase" strip-periods="true"/>
        </else-if>
        <else-if position="subsequent">
          <group delimiter=" ">
            <choose>
              <if type="book">
                <text macro="juris-title-short" strip-periods="true"/>
              </if>
              <else>
                <text macro="juris-title-short" strip-periods="true" font-style="italic"/>
              </else>
            </choose>
            <text variable="first-reference-note-number" prefix="(n " suffix=")"/>
            <text macro="juris-locator"/>
          </group>
        </else-if>
      </choose>
    </layout>
  </citation>
</style>
<<===== CSL =====<<


>>===== INPUT =====>>
[
    {
        "id": "ITEM-1", 
        "type": "legal_case",
        "title": "Donoghue v. Stevenson",
        "title-short": "Donoghue",
        "authority": "House of Lords",
        "collection-number": "1932",
        "container-title": "A.C.",
        "page": "562",
        "jurisdiction": "gb",
        "issued": {
          "date-parts": [
            [1932]
          ]
        }
    },
    {
        "id": "ITEM-2", 
        "type": "book",
        "title": "Bogus Book"
    },
    {
        "id": "ITEM-3", 
        "type": "legal_case",
        "title": "Callery v. Gray",
        "title-short": "Callery",
        "collection-number": "2001",
        "container-title": "E.W.C.A. Civ.",
        "page": "1117",
        "jurisdiction": "gb",
        "issued": {
          "date-parts": [
            [2001]
          ]
        }
    },
    {
        "id": "ITEM-4", 
        "type": "legal_case",
        "title": "Boulton v Jones",
        "title-short": "Boulton",
        "container-title": "H&N",
        "volume": "2",
        "page": "564",
        "jurisdiction": "gb",
        "issued": {
          "date-parts": [
            [1857]
          ]
        }
    },
    {
        "id": "ITEM-5", 
        "type": "legal_case",
        "title": "Stubbs v. Sayer",
        "title-short": "Stubbs",
        "jurisdiction": "gb",
        "authority": "Court of Appeal",
        "issued": {
          "date-parts": [
            [1990, 11, 8]
          ]
        }
    }
]
